pkgmetadata.longdescription: Matching Algorithms for Causal Inference with Clustered Data // Provides functions to perform matching algorithms for causal inference with clustered data, as described in B. Arpino and M. Cannas (2016) doi:10.1002/sim.6880. Pure within-cluster and preferential within-cluster matching are implemented. Both algorithms provide causal estimates with cluster-adjusted estimates of standard errors.
